value.title: Brand your Report Server
value.excerpt: I break down how to make a branding package for SQL Server Reporting Services 2016. I compare it from the original skin, to the multicolor brand package that Chris Finlan put together, to my custom brand package for Guy in a Cube.  Branding the web portal - https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt710551.aspx

value.title: Bring Power BI to your every day Microsoft Teams usage
value.excerpt: Have you added the Power BI app to Microsoft Teams? Bring Power BI closer to your day to day and have your reports ready when you need them! Adam shows you how. value.title: Combine Power BI Report Tooltips using DAX

This can be useful when you want to use a single report tooltip for multiple Power BI visuals.  LET'S CONNECT! This involves downloading and installing Power BI Desktop optimized for Power BI Report Server and connecting to Analysis Services

value.title: Demystifying Custom Partitions in Power BI
value.excerpt: We talk about Incremental Refresh a lot, but what if you need custom partitions in Power BI? How do you even create those? They look scary! Patrick takes the mystery away and walks you through how you can create them.  Partitions in tabular models https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/tabular-models/partitions-ssas-tabular
